description: Explore the beautiful country estate of this Gothic Revival Mansion in Tiverton, Devon. The walk takes you through the delightful formal gardens with over 10,000 different species of plant. There are also acres of parkland with fabulous views of the rolling Devon countryside and a number of peaceful wooded paths. The Exe Valley Way long distance footpath runs just to the west of the park. You can pick up the trail and enjoy miles of riverside paths. In Tiverton you can enjoy easy walking along the towpath of the Grand Western Canal which starts in the town.
